start.speaker: gnome-professor
start.text: Well hello there Guido, greetings from the land of Gielinor!

start.speaker: gnome-professor
start.text: I'm sorry to say Sinterklaas couldn't make it because he is stuck at home.

start.speaker: gnome-professor
start.text: Instead, he asked me to get you a present.

start.speaker: guido
start.text: Aah that's sweet of you. Thank you!

start.speaker: gnome-professor
start.text: Not so fast! Where's the fun in that?

start.speaker: gnome-professor
start.text: No... I think you need to earn this present.

start.speaker: gnome-professor
start.text: Therefore, I have created a challenge for you!
The gnome-professor hands over a clue scroll

start.speaker: gnome-professor
start.text: If you manage to solve this clue, you will earn your reward!

start.speaker: guido
start.text: Aah a clue scroll! That's my favourite part of this game!

start.speaker: gnome-professor
start.text: Don't worry about walking around for hours, I will provide you with means of transportation.
The gnome-professor takes a book from his bag.

start.speaker: guido
start.text: How is this supposed to be a means of transportation?!

start.speaker: gnome-professor
start.text: I have a weird feeling that you have used one of these before. Anyway, you'll figure it out!

start.speaker: gnome-professor
start.text: Good luck, and let the Games of Gielinor begin!!
